dict.acceptation: 相遇；相识；开会；接触（某物）；
满足；支付；迎接；经历（常指不愉快的事）；
运动会，体育比赛；猎狐运动（尤其英式英语）；

sent.orig: Let's meet at the bus stop.
sent.trans: 我们在公共汽车站碰头(meet)吧。

sent.orig: Then Obadiah went to meet Ahab, and he told him. And Ahab went to meet Elijah.
sent.trans: 16于是俄巴底去迎着亚哈，告诉他；亚哈就去迎着以利亚。

sent.orig: Nice to meet you, too. Thank you for coming to meet us.
sent.trans: 我也很高兴认识您。谢谢您来接我们。

sent.orig: So Obadiah went to meet Ahab and told him: and Ahab went to meet Elijah.
sent.trans: 16于是俄巴底去迎著亚哈，告诉他；亚哈就去迎著以利亚。

sent.orig: After what medicine ate to meet to after what medicine ate to meet half hours, die?
sent.trans: 别担心了，医生和药店的药师也怕出事故呀。什么药吃了会半小时后死？
